### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill is connected to a wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5) with lab input and connected to power network
### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) connected to a wooden chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter at position(x=0.5, y=3.5) connected to a wooden chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)
### Electricity generator at position(x=2.5, y=2.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Small electric pole at position(x=2.5, y=2.5) connected to other poles and forming an electricity group

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it
-  Make sure the entity you are trying to insert into can accept the item
### Errors when extracting items from entities
-  Ensure the entity you are trying to extract from contains the item you want to extract
-  Make sure you are at the correct position to extract the item
### Errors when accessing local variables
-  Ensure the local variable is defined and associated with a value before trying to access it
### Errors when placing entities into occupied tiles
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity
### Errors when using entities without required ingredients or fuel
-  Ensure the entity has the required ingredients or fuel to function before using it
